amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase by $500,000 the amount of funds provided for the Historic Preservation Fund to be used for competitive grants for the survey and nomination of properties to the National Register of Historic Places and as National Historic Landmarks associated with communities currently under-represented.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
